title: internet ubiquitous
extract: Ubiquitous computing (or "ubicomp") is a concept in software engineering and computer science where computing is made to appear anytime and everywhere. ... When primarily concerning the objects involved, it is also known as physical computing, the Internet of Things, haptic computing, and "things that think".
extract_html: Ubiquitous computing (or "ubicomp") is a concept in software engineering and computer science where computing is made to appear anytime and everywhere. ... When primarily concerning the objects involved, it is also known as physical computing, the Internet of Things, haptic computing, and "things that think".
